  <description>
    <facet>
      <vocabularyID>LRE.expressionDescriptionFacetValues</vocabularyID>
      <value>main</value>
    </facet>
    <metadata>
      <schema>http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM</schema>
      <lom xsi:schemaLocation="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/lomv1.0/lomLoose.xsd" xmlns="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM">
        <general>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>ILMoE</catalog>
            <entry>ILMoE2676</entry>
          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="en">The effect of distance on the forces between like charged particles.</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Der Effekt des Abstandes auf den Kräften zwischen
wie belastete Partikel.</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">L'effet de la distance sur les forces entre comme 
les particules chargées.</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">O efeito da distância nas forças no meio como 
partículas carregadas.</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">L'effetto della distanza sulle forze in mezzo come
le particelle caricate.</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Η επίδραση της απόστασης στις δυνάμεις μεταξύ των 
ομοειδών χρεωμένων μορίων.</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">El efecto de la distancia en las fuerzas en medio 
como partículas cargadas.</string>
          </title>
          <language>en</language>
          <description>
            <string language="en">An animation which dmonstrates the repulsive forces betwen two like charged particles, and the effect that distance has on these forces</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">physics</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">electrical phenomena</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">electrical charge</string>
          </keyword>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Eine Animation, der dmonstrates die repulsive Kräfte zwei
wie belastete Partikel betwen und der Effekt, den Abstand auf diesen 
Kräften hat</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Une animation que les dmonstrates les forces répulsives 
betwen deux comme les particules chargées, et l'effet que la distance
a sur ces forces</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Um animation que os dmonstrates as forças repulsive 
betwen dois como partículas carregadas, e o efeito que a distância 
tem nestas forças</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Una animazione che i dmonstrates le forze repulsive betwen
due come le particelle caricate e l'effetto che la distanza ha su 
queste forze</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Μια ζωτικότητα που dmonstrates οι αποκρουστικές 
δυνάμεις δύο όπως τα χρεωμένα μόρια, και η επίδραση που η 
απόσταση έχει σε αυτές τις δυνάμεις</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Una animación que los dmonstrates las fuerzas repulsive 
betwen dos como partículas cargadas, y el efecto que la distancia 
tiene en estas fuerzas</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Physik</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">elektrische Phänomene</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">elektrische Ladung</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">physique</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">phénomènes électriques</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">charge électrique</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">física</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">fenômenos elétricos</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>

          </keyword>
          <keyword>

          </keyword>
          <keyword>

          </keyword>
